title: WearableMeasurementTypeEnumeration
description: Enumerates common types of measurement for wearables products.

allOf.description: Enumeration of common measurement types (or dimensions), for example "chest" for a person, "inseam" for pants, "gauge" for screws, or "wheel" for bicycles.

MeasurementTypeEnumeration.title: MeasurementTypeEnumeration
MeasurementTypeEnumeration.description: Enumeration of common measurement types (or dimensions), for example "chest" for a person, "inseam" for pants, "gauge" for screws, or "wheel" for bicycles.
